cu.explanation_en: Setting the RRC log level to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause logging initialization failure and prevent proper system diagnostics.

du.explanation_en: Setting the RRC log level to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause logging initialization failure and prevent proper system diagnostics.
du.explanation_zh: 將 RRC 日誌等級設定為無效值 'invalid' 會導致日誌初始化失敗，並阻止正確的系統診斷。
